title: Mom and I
subtle: Descriptive (nonfiction), 40 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR80L
description: The lovable photographs of mother animals and their babies used in Mom and I will immediately capture the attention of readers. Simple repetitive text and the use of high-frequency words support beginning readers.
meta: apes, dolphins, elephants, giraffes, kangaroos, zebras
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Initial Consonants : Discriminate the initial /m/ sound
Consonants : Identify and write initial consonant Mm
Proper Nouns : Recognize the word I as a proper noun
High-Frequency Words : Recognize and write the high-frequency word and

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
